name: reelsteady-joiner
description: ReelSteady joiner merge multiple GoPro separate video files into one without losing gyro data

scripts.build-mac-arm64: export npm_config_arch=arm64 && rm -rf ./node_modules/ && npm install && electron-builder build --mac --arm64
scripts.build-mac-x64: export npm_config_arch=x64 && rm -rf ./node_modules/ && npm install && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.build-win: rmdir /s /q node_modules && npm install && electron-builder build --win --x64

author: rubegartor
